description: Tetrahedron with T(t,n,k) = t - n; succession of growing finite triangles with declining values per row.
example: First triangle: [0]; second triangle: [1; 0 0]; third triangle: [2; 1 1; 0 0 0]; ...
crossrefs: Together with A056558 and A056560 might enable reading "by antidiagonals" of cube arrays as 3-dimensional analog of A002262 and A025581 with square arrays.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 26 2000
